result.title: Cooperation agreements
result.description: This deliverable will address the set up of a cooperation agreement among training stakeholders to expand and consolidate a long lasting network of training centres and to facilitate the international mobility of professionals and trainees. This will be for the benefit of the project partners as well as for other future users.
